entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
